VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Agricultural Product Market Share?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Agricultural Product Market Share is Irrigation Water Use Efficiency

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Agricultural Product Market Share?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Agricultural Product Market Share is Land Utilization Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Land Utilization Rate, is the point for Henderson LtdFarm inside or outside the point for Ray LtdFarm?
SRP.A: On the Land Utilization Rate, the point for Henderson LtdFarm is inside the point for Ray LtdFarm.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Land Utilization Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Ray LtdFarm?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Land Utilization Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Agricultural Product Market Share}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Agricultural Product Market Share, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Agricultural Product Market Share, label {Ray LtdFarm} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Yield Growth Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Yield Growth Rate, label {Ray LtdFarm} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Henderson LtdFarm on the Irrigation Water Use Efficiency in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Henderson LtdFarm on the Safety dimension is {86}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Henderson LtdFarm on the Land Utilization Rate in the radar chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Henderson LtdFarm across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Henderson LtdFarm across all dimensions is {77}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Ray LtdFarm across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Ray LtdFarm across all dimensions is {77}.

NF.Q: For Henderson LtdFarm in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores below 36? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For Ray LtdFarm, which dimension has a higher score: Agricultural Product Market Share or Irrigation Water Use Efficiency?
NC.A: {Irrigation Water Use Efficiency} has a higher score than Agricultural Product Market Share for Ray LtdFarm.

NC.Q: On Land Utilization Rate, which label has a higher score: Henderson LtdFarm or the Ray LtdFarm?
NC.A: {Ray LtdFarm} has a higher score on Land Utilization Rate compared to Henderson LtdFarm.

NC.Q: On Irrigation Water Use Efficiency, which label has a higher score: Ray LtdFarm or the Henderson LtdFarm?
NC.A: {Henderson LtdFarm} has a higher score on Irrigation Water Use Efficiency compared to Ray LtdFarm.

NC.Q: For Henderson LtdFarm, which dimension has a higher score: Agricultural Product Market Share or Irrigation Water Use Efficiency or Yield Growth Rate?
NC.A: {Irrigation Water Use Efficiency} has a higher score for Henderson LtdFarm.

MSR.Q: For Henderson LtdFarm, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Henderson LtdFarm most needs to improve its {Land Utilization Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Henderson LtdFarm}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Ray LtdFarm}.
